All The Cards

Monster Cards
#NameElementLifeDescriptionFound
C*001TigerGround6*Miracle Team or unlocked in ruins
C*002GaliAir7*Miracle Team or unlocked in ruins
C*003GolemGround9*Powerful Team or unlocked in ruins
C*004SuezoGround7*Miracle Team or unlocked in ruins
C*005PixieAir6*Powerful Team or unlocked in ruins
C*006DinoGround8*Speed Team or unlocked in ruins
C*007NagaGround8*Powerful Team or unlocked in ruins
C*008HareGround6*Speed Team or unlocked in ruins
C*009MocchiGround7*Speed Team or unlocked in ruins
C*010Hare HoundGround6Tiger Attack Hare DefRestart game & become a master without losing any license battles
C*011Big BlueGround7Golem Attack Tiger DefFind all the mural pieces then look at mural in the monster card shrine
C*012MelonzoGround6Suezo Attack Dino DefFeed Suezo at the arena with lots of MilkStuff and you'll eventually find it
C*013AllureAir7Pixie Attack Naga DefBecome a master without losing any license battles
C*014Rock DinoGround7Dino Attack Golem DefBattle Millie in the 5th basement of Rihet's ruins after becoming master
C*015Fairy HareAir5Hare Attack Pixie DefDrop many WondaCoins in the city fountain -when Calin talks about shadows enter any ruin - you will be challenged by one of the three brothers. Defeat them all
C*021PhoenixAir4*give Feather to Mac enter password TECMOINC
